channel.title: TheScap3 Dev team, Already complete, Just need a host!
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/5etr9l.png[/img]
We still need a host. We (Djgrvzz and Cody) made a Project Insanity source 317 loading 612 server. We have custom dungeoneering and a great eco setup. We also have a new point system called PPT. Interested email me at:
[size=14pt][b]thescap3@yahoo.com[/b][/size]
You must be able to keep server 100%. Not be on a shared computer. Have a decent internet connection that never goes down. Or just have a VPS.
If you host off a VPS for us we will give you 75% of donations.
Thank you.
Edit: If you want the website you can find the websites here: Dev update site: http://www.wix.com/thescap3/tsupdates#! Main site (Cody has not redone name yet): http://runenations.hostzi.com/ Forums (same as above): http://rnserver.webs.com/

item.title: TheScap3 Dev team, Already complete, Just need a host!
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

[quote=“grvzdavdubz, post:7, topic:409391”][quote author=runewings317 link=topic=510675.msg3705809#msg3705809 date=1313024832]

[quote author=grvzdavdubz link=topic=510675.msg3705804#msg3705804 date=1313024550]

I don’t think your aloud to ask for hosters…

Your not, but you are aloud to find a dev team. Lol.
[/quote]This isn’t a development team.

__> Dont end up trolling, in a sense and in the rules, this could be considered a dev team cause the other three people are already coding, and we just need one last person in the dev team, which would be a host.
if this was just me asking for a host, yes, it would be against the rules. But this is me saying someone can become part of a dev team if they can host.
[/quote]I can keep this up all night

If you already have a team, shouldn’t this go in the server development section? Just ask for a hoster in there. It would also be more logical to get your own VPS cause people can just say, “I have one!” and take your source and release it.

Another Troll FTW and this is the only way on Moparscape that you can ask for a host without it being against rules. So sorry if it annoyed you :P[/quote];D

Read full topic
item.source: TheScap3 Dev team, Already complete, Just need a host!
